info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Herkimer County through 215 PM EDT... At 146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Utica, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, penny size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in urban and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Frankfort, Cedarville, Elizabethtown, Birmingham Corners, Jersalem Hill, West Frankfort, Spinnerville, Cedarville Station, Corrado Corners, Cedar Lake, Harbor, Gulph, East Winfield, Parker Corners, Cranes Corners, South Ilion, Chepachet, Norwich Corners and Millers Mills Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern New York.
